::Hot Rod/Scorponok-Zarak/Jhiaxus::
   
  Hot Rod was lead off with Perceptor's group.
   
  Jhiaxus and Zarak follow Hydras.
   
  Zarak mentally makes his Scorponok drone move inside the base and then lay dormant in scorpion mode.
   
  Jhiaxus: I await our future time to be spent with the prisoner.
   
  Zarak: What's the chance that your med bay has anything that is of use to organics like me?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/Shuttle/Perceptor:

The shuttle landed and the door oppened, outside was Perceptor 
waitting to the new comer and his captors

Hydras stood up and said "Myrmidon and Trelos, follow Perceptor, he 
will show you where our party will be and will help him to prepare 
our guest; Jhiaxus, I'll guide your pals to CR, also we have a lil 
thing to discuss before our private party..."and looking to Rodimus 
said devilish"We meet us in a while, old pal, we will have some 
funwith you before your ultimate fate"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> > > ::Zarak::
> > > 
> > > Zarak: It's more likely that he felt going after his wife was 
a 
> > personal matter. he probably left the Maximals without telling 
them 
> > where he was going. He has always been very headstrong.
> > 
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > "Indeed" hissed hydras
> 
> Myrmidon nodded as he watched the ship slice through the air, moving
> quickly towards the Predicon base. "They will indeed pay for that
> quality." A small smile traced itself across his face as he glanced
> over in the direction of Hot Rod.
> 
> --------------------------------------
> 
> Meanwhile outside the shuttle, enfolded in a field of invisibility a
> black jet hung poised in the air like some wicked raptor, hidden yet
> watching the events as they unfolded. Even as the Predicon shuttle 
took
> off carrying thier captured cargo the cloaked ship sent off a short
> encrypted message burst. >Subject in flight. orders?<
> 
> Quickly came a reply: >clandestined pursuit, report<
> 
> The ship banked as it engaged its own engines, detection
> countermeasures hiding even this as it took off after the shuttle,
> shadowing it from a distance.
> 
> 
> Preston
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
